rice.name: Leaf Blight
rice.symptoms: Linear lesions with gray centers and brown margins
rice.management: Use resistant varieties, apply copper-based fungicides

rice.name: Rice Blast
rice.symptoms: Diamond-shaped lesions with white to gray centers

wheat.name: Leaf Rust
wheat.management: Use resistant cultivars, apply triazole fungicides

wheat.name: Powdery Mildew
wheat.management: Improve air circulation, apply sulfur dust

cotton.name: Boll Rot
cotton.symptoms: Water-soaked lesions on bolls turning black

cotton.name: Leaf Curl Virus
cotton.symptoms: Upward curling leaves with thickened veins
